dataYaml.name: I am Juan Carlos,
dataYaml.summary:
Hi, I'm Juan Carlos Jara. I'm a 28-year-old developer living in Peru. I'm currently slowly reading Clean Code. I've being working building apps using React/Redux/NodeJS and others JS libraries for about 4 years. Before that, I mostly developed web apps(MVC4, C#, JavaScript) from design to deployment, but I also did business process modeling and optimization of internal company processes using Engage/Bizagi BPM.
I mostly develop my personal projects using JavaScript in all the stack, ReactJS/NodeJS and MongoDB. I've done some small projects using Clojure/Clojurescript I would like to keep learning about it because I feel that functional programming has a lot to bring to the table and will make me think different about programming.
Besides programming, I enjoy programming â˜º, listening to music, traveling, eating delicious food, watching movies and TV series, playing/watching(twitch) dota and hearthstone.
I'm looking for a job where I can keep improving my coding skills using pair programming and code review.
